protein.specific_function: This protein is one of the nuclear-coded polypeptide chains of cytochrome c oxidase, the terminal oxidase in mitochondrial electron transport

reference.reference_text: Fabrizi GM, Sadlock J, Hirano M, Mita S, Koga Y, Rizzuto R, Zeviani M, Schon EA: Differential expression of genes specifying two isoforms of subunit VIa of human cytochrome c oxidase. Gene. 1992 Oct 1;119(2):307-12.
